text: @MurielBowser Have 2 go probably not. Here’s a catch 22 4U. Those with chronic respiratory problems face a double whammy. Wear a mask & can’t breath. Don’t wear a mask & get Coronavirus. I know. Stay my arse home. Easy 4U 2 say. But I have masks & wear them when I need 2. Still. Let me stand
